page.title: 14Housing _ Leck area
page.content: In our questionnaire we asked the age of the houses. Many of them were very old.Only two or three houses have been built in the last ten years in our area. Only 9 houses have been built in the last 50 years. Years ago houses were built of stone because there was so much around but then it changed to brick.Nowadays the planners say that brick doesn't look right in our area.To build in stone is costly and so houses are often built in cement blocks and faced in stone or pebble dashed.Most people live in detached houses,but cottages in villages are joined together in rows. There is a trend now to renovate old houses,but a few years ago these might have been pulled down and new inferior houses built.The average age of the houses covered in our survey is 148 years.
